ivardefs.name: expectedSupplyDuration
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the period time over which the supplied product is expected to be used, or the length of time the dispense is expected to last.

ivardefs.name: numberOfRepeatsAllowed
ivardefs.desc: An integer indicating the number of times, in addition to the original dispense, (aka refills or repeats) that the patient can receive the prescribed medication. Usage Notes: This integer does not include the original order dispense. This means that if an

ivardefs.name: performer
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the intended dispensing Organization specified by the prescriber.

ivardefs.name: quantity
ivardefs.desc: The amount that is to be dispensed for one fill.

ivardefs.name: validityPeriod
ivardefs.desc: This indicates the validity period of a prescription (stale dating the Prescription).

properties.desc: Indicates the specific details for the dispense or medication supply part of a medication request (also known as a Medication Prescription or Medication Order).  Note that this information is not always sent with the order.  There may be in some settings
